details.questKeyLocations: The quest keys may show up in "cards" within the first couple of minutes of any of my videos from this year.  They may also appear in photos posted to my Flickr photostream this year (in the photo itself, or in tags or descriptions).  If you don't know my Flickr photostream, you'll have to figure that out, too.

quests.text: What (very specific) color is my Porsche Boxster?
I've vlogged about two Nikon film cameras I've bought within the past 356 days. What were they?
Find my flickr.com photostream. What are the names of my three 'bestest college buddies'?
